Text.val: 07.12.2004 MW SCR#7129 --> Disallow for internal users
This program was re-built in 2007 according to new users cpecs (see SCR)
27.07.2011 AS SCR#16638. Changes required for new length of invoice numbers
22.05.2009 AK added the possibility for skip messages
29.10.2007 AK SCR13045 add handling for discount handling
22.06.2007 AK SCR12595 fixed bug : wrong merging of SID
continue with prog if access is not locked, otherwise print message and term
get payment code for direct payments

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRPAY) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/bpiv where BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 and BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :5 for fetch only
